title: 22: S4E22 – "Merry Massacre" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you five terrifying tales from authors C.L. McLendon, Derek Hawke, R.D. Smithey, NateJay82, and Jeffrey Ebright, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about unexpected storms, grisly gifts, perilous presents, sickening Santas, and holiday hallucinations. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s4e22
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
